DOC.brief_summary: The goal clinical research study learn chemotherapy combination call augment Berlin-Frankfurt-Munster ( BFM ) , also combine ofatumumab rituximab , help control precursor-B ALL LL patient 12-30 year age . The safety drug combination also study . Augmented BFM make daunorubicin , vincristine , prednisone , dexamethasone , PEG asparaginase , methotrexate .
